name: Marketing Plus
description:
Marketing Plus is a medium-sized, full-service creative agency, specializing in print advertising elements, business to business and public relations.
Marketing Plus prides itself on, and is known for:
- Specialized experience in creative concepts.
- High-level graphics and knowledge with most current technology and software producing quality work for all programs.
- Efficient communication program development in all mediums, “out-of-the-box” approaches, print, radio, social media, and PR programs.
